mapper.sql: SELECT ID, NOME, DESCRICAO, UUID FROM TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA
mapper.select: SELECT TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA.NOME as nome, TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA.DATA_INCLUSAO as dataInclusao, TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA_DIARIA.DATA_ATUALIZACAO as dataAtualizacao, TB_USUARIO.NOME as nomeUsuario FROM TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA JOIN TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA_DIARIA ON TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA.ID = TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA_DIARIA.ID_DEMANDA_TAREFA JOIN TB_USUARIO ON TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA_DIARIA.ID_USUARIO = TB_USUARIO.ID WHERE ID_DEMANDA = #{idDemanda} ORDER BY NOME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_DEMANDA_TAREFA (NOME, DESCRICAO, ID_DEMANDA, USU_INCLUSAO, DATA_INCLUSAO, UUID) VALUES (#{nome}, #{descricao}, #{idDemanda}, #{usuarioInclusao.id}, #{dataInclusao}, #{uuid})
